name: @mfelibs/vue-plugin-exposure
description: vue插件 曝光组件 使用intersection-observer

scripts.next: git add . && git commit -m 'next' && npm version prerelease && cnpm publish --tag next
scripts.patch: git add . && git commit -m 'patch' && npm version patch && cnpm publish
